title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon Casts a Long Shadow Over the Stagnant French Left
snippet: Jean-Luc Mélenchon, one of France’s most hated politicians, casts a shadow over the left at a critical juncture.

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - Wikipedia
snippet: Mélenchon has been labelled a populist by numerous diverse people, with the Socialist Party senator Luc Carvounas saying he goes to "the summits of demagoguery and populism", and the magazine Slate stating that Mélenchon's rhetoric is "shocking" and implying his entire political life is based around pleasing the people.

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon – POLITICO
snippet: January 7, 2025 5:03 pm CET · Advertisement · The Socialists have taken timid steps toward emancipation from far-left firebrand Jean-Luc Mélenchon. January 3, 2025 4:00 am CET ·

title: France in Crisis: an Interview with Jean Luc Melenchon and La France Insoumise - CounterPunch.org
snippet: Jean Luc Melenchon : The capitalists are getting behind the far right. Do you know why? Because there is intense social mobilization against the decisions stemming from the neoliberal program.

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - World news, culture and opinion
snippet: The Parti Socialiste, which has broken free of radical-left leader Jean-Luc Mélenchon, is not done with its battles. It will, by 2027, need to win back moderate voters who have shunned it for the past seven years, at a time when PM François ...
